content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.5, y=-78.5) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)
-  Stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### Pipe group system at position(x=107.5, y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
-  Ensure that burner entities have sufficient fuel to operate
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
-  Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients to function
### Errors when using steam engine without connection
-  Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power source
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
-  Ensure that pipe groups have fluid to transport
### Errors when using belt groups without items
-  Ensure that belt groups have items to transport
### Errors when using electricity groups without connection to electric network
-  Ensure that electricity groups are connected to an electric network

# NAMESPACE
*Important variables:*
- `burner_mining_drill_position`: (x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- `stone_furnace_position`: (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- `offshore_pump_position`: (x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- `boiler_position`: (x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- `steam_engine_position`: (x=117.5, y=-30.5)
*Utility functions:*
- `create_burner_mining_drill(x, y)`: Creates a burner mining drill at position (x, y)
- `create_stone_furnace(x, y)`: Creates a stone furnace at position (x, y)
- `create_offshore_pump(x, y)`: Creates an offshore pump at position (x, y)
- `create_boiler(x, y)`: Creates a boiler at position (x, y)
- `create_steam_engine(x, y)`: Creates a steam engine at position (x, y)
